text: Amândio Ramiro Barreiras (born 11 February 1952) is a Portuguese football manager and a former player. He played 15 seasons and 305 games in the Primeira Liga for Boavista, Sporting Espinho, Vitória de Guimarães, União de Leiria, Chaves and Sporting. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Boavista on 12 September 1971 in a game against Sporting. ==Honors== ===Boavista=== *Taça de Portugal winner: 1974–1975, 1978–79. ==References== ==External links== Category:1952 births Category:People from Bragança District Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:G.D.
